scripts.dev: PRISMA_GENERATE_DATAPROXY=true PRISMA_CLIENT_USE_DATAPROXY=true PRISMA_ENGINES_CHECKSUM_IGNORE_MISSING=1 PRISMA_SKIP_DOWNLOAD=1 PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=library npx prisma generate --data-proxy --no-engine && next dev
scripts.build: echo 'ðŸ”§ Iniciando build do Next.js...' && next build
scripts.postinstall: echo 'ðŸ”§ Executando postinstall...' && PRISMA_ENGINES_CHECKSUM_IGNORE_MISSING=1 PRISMA_SKIP_DOWNLOAD=1 PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=library node scripts/force-prisma-generate.js
